data.title: Detroit Tigers release 2022 spring training schedule; Grapefruit League begins Feb. 26
data.meta_description: The Detroit Tigers begin Grapefruit League play in spring training with the Washington Nationals on Feb. 26 at Joker Marchant Stadium in Lakeland.
data.text:
The Detroit Tigers have 2022 Opening Day slated for March 31 at T-Mobile Park in Seattle against the Mariners.

But first, the Tigers must get through a 33-game spring training schedule.

That schedule begins with an exhibition Feb. 25 against Southeastern University at Joker Marchant Stadium in Lakeland, Florida, before Grapefruit League competition starts Feb. 26 against the Washington Nationals in Lakeland.

On Feb. 27, the Tigers play their first road game against the Pittsburgh Pirates in Bradenton.

JEFF SEIDEL: When Tigers fans can expect to see Riley Greene and Spencer Torkelson in Detroit

Entering the 2022 season, the Tigers are expected to boast a trio of second-year pitchers in the starting rotation: Casey Mize, Tarik Skubal and Matt Manning. Infielder Spencer Torkelson and outfielder Riley Greene — the organization's best hitting prospects recently promoted to Triple-A Toledo — will compete for spots on the Opening Day roster.

There might even be a new, flashy shortstop in town.

LOOKING AHEAD: Why Tigers think next season's MLB trade deadline could look different than 2021

OWNER SPEAKS: Christopher Ilitch: Spending more in free agency 'could happen this winter'

The Tigers have 33 Grapefruit League games on the schedule, including split-squads March 1 (Phillies, Blue Jays), March 9 (Blue Jays, Orioles) and March 23 (Braves, Phillies). All six split-squad contests are on the road.

Of the 33 games, 17 will be played at Joker Marchant Stadium in Lakeland.

2022 SCHEDULE: Opening Day on March 31 at Seattle Mariners

The spring training schedule concludes March 28 against the Tampa Bay Rays in Lakeland. The Tigers then open the 2022 regular season on the road with a four-game series with the Mariners (March 31-April 3) and a three-game set with the Oakland Athletics (April 4-6).

The Tigers' home opener is April 8 against the Chicago White Sox at Comerica Park.
